channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Police in Taiwan Capture Escaped Fugitive
item.description: Police in Taiwan have captured a fugitive who escaped from court-ordered psychiatric care, ending a four-day manhunt.

item.title: The Vatican Wants To Open an Office in China, Leaving Taiwan Ties in Question
item.description: The Vatican, Taiwan's last diplomatic ally in Europe, announced it wants to open a permanent office in China. Some are wondering if that puts its relationship with Taiwan at risk.

item.title: Inside Taiwan's Biggest Vehicle Recycling Facility
item.description: Established in Kaohsiung more than 20 years ago, Taiwan's largest vehicle shredding plant enables over 80% of each scrapped car to be recycled.

item.title: China Simulates Blockade of Taiwan in Large-Scale Military Drills
item.description: China is conducting its largest military operations around Taiwan in almost a year, surrounding the island with warplanes and ships. Beijing says the two-day drills, which simulate
